changelog: UI OVERHAUL (Part 2): Entirely redesigned Welcome and About screens with modern visual refinements and smart tooltips.
PER-APP AUTO-CLOSE: Added individual toggles to choose which apps should close automatically after your flight.
AUTO-CLOSE COUNTDOWN: New post-flight window with a countdown timer, manual cancel option, and visibility settings.
MAIN PROCESS MONITORING: Added a safety warning with troubleshooting tips if the game process closes unexpectedly early.
ADVANCED PROFILE IMPORT: New option to either Merge or Replace existing profiles when importing data.
SMART .EXE DETECTION: Fixed a bug where auto-detect would pick uninstallers or helpers instead of the main application file.
IMPROVED ALGORITHMS: Enhanced detection for MS Store, Xbox app, and applications using external secondary launchers.
SHORTCUT UPDATE PREVIEW: You can now preview the full changelog directly from the update window when launching via shortcuts.
STABILITY: Refined button activation logic and fixed several minor graphical and functional bugs.
